titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to convey the vessel USS SPHINX to the Rio Grande Military Museum for use as a military museum.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E214)
Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee On Merchant Marine.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.3059.

bill.summary: 2/23/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to convey the vessel USS SPHINX to the Rio Grande Military Museum for use as a military museum if certain conditions are met.
